page.title: 19School Visit Buckfastleigh
page.content: On 5th June 1985 our school went by coach to Buckfastleigh. It was for Infants and a few Juniors who were not going to School Camp. Lots of parents came. At Buckfastleigh we looked at the museum there which had lots of pictures of steam engines and there were ships inside glass boxes. Later we went on the platform to get on a steam train. We went on the train to Totnes. On the way we saw Lorraine Chase, a television personality. At Totnes we had a quick visit and got back on the train to Buckfastleigh where we went in the Butterfly Farm. We had a worksheet to fill in. We also saw goldfish and rainbow trout. By Hayley Stooke, age 10
